data: A small Carbonara pizza is a delicious choice!
As for a drink, you might enjoy a refreshing soda
It depends on the number of pizzas of the order, typically around 15 minutes per pizza, but depends on how busy we are.
Margarita pizzas are 10$ for small, 15$ for medium and 20$ for big. The other predefined pizzas, except for carbonara are 2$ more for each size. Carbonara is 2.5$ more for each size.
